thread.title: How I Get It Done: Eileen Fisher, Founder of the Eponymous Sustainable Basics Clothing Line
thread.title_full: How I Get It Done: Eileen Fisher, Founder of the Eponymous Sustainable Basics Clothing Line

author: Dayna Evans
title: How I Get It Done: Eileen Fisher, Founder of the Eponymous Sustainable Basics Clothing Line
text: Eileen Fisher is the fashion designer and founder behind the clothing brand of the same name. She describes herself as “totally tech resistant” and tries to work from her home outside of the city at least four days a week. She loves to meditate and would always prefer... More »
